name: [ENG] One page RPG - Mandragora's by night
name_original: [ENG] One page RPG - Mandragora's by night
description:
"Mandragora's by night" is a small test and was waiting on my HD for about 1 year, waiting for some small graphic adjustment. This game is made to be simple,  whacky and weird.

It is a TTRPG made for 1 GM and several players. You play as old people, exploring strange ruins hidden beneath their retirement home, The Mandragoras.

The system is a free adaptation of the Cthulhu hack system and fits on the recto. The other side of the document contains some lore elements and 3 random tables to explore the undergrounds !
